title: Take a Load Off
description:
Jillian and crew teach us how to battle seasonal depression, tackle kinesiology tape, and ditch the patterns that build resentments, hold you back, and weigh you down.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ


This week’s sponsor codes:

SAGELYNATURALS.com, promo code JILLIAN at checkout for 20% off your first order

ALAYANATURALS.com, promo code JMPOD for 15% off

RITUAL.com/JILLIAN to start your ritual

GETQUIP.com/JILLIANto get your first refill pack free with a quip electric toothbrush

POLICYGENIUS.com to find the right policy in minutes

TALKSPACE.com/JILLIAN, promo code JILLIAN to get $45 off your first month

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
